channel.title: CVE Feed for Cisco -- Cisco Edge Fog Fabric
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cisco -- Cisco Edge Fog Fabric

item.title: CVE-2020-26084|2024-09-16T19:47:24.314Z -- cisco -- cisco%20edge%20fog%20fabric
item.description: A vulnerability in the REST API of Cisco Edge Fog Fabric could allow an authenticated, remote attacker to access files outside of their authorization sphere on an affected device. The vulnerability is due to incorrect authorization enforcement on an affected system. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted request to the API. A successful exploit could allow the attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the affected device.
